message: Statify is a website monitoring service, It's my first python django project, right now it's just a landing page but feedback would be welcomed. Thanks. http://statifyme.com
If I didn't read the type, I'd guess it was something related to dark magic or fantasy role play games. Personally, I'd clean it up a bit, modernize, lose the purple and yellow.
Its too thin on content on the home page, looks like a site that has a under construction feel to it. I realize you are starting out, but I feel it needs to get more busy
What font is the logo in?

i think you should either stick to a grid (or at least vertically align things) with the direction you're taking. the footer's center doesn't seem to match the rest of your site, some things look right aligned when they should be centered, and the noise in the image looks like a bad quality jpg instead of a texture. other than that, i kind of like the oddball colors.
